wikipedia.title: Large Professor
wikipedia.extract: Large Professor is the stage name of William Paul Mitchell (born March 21, 1972), an American rapper and record producer also known as Large Pro and Extra P. Based in New York City, he is known as a founding member of the underground hip hop group Main Source and as mentor and frequent collaborator of Nas. About.com ranked Large Professor #13 on its Top 25 Hip-Hop Producers list.

opinions.details: 大号教授？(歌里道：Why's my name the Large Professor? 'Cause I milked your cow: in other words, I hit your heifer.) 但也有另外的说法：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L2mmMWqizqA
